hymn.title: Softly and tenderly Jesus is calling

layout.singingstanza: Soft -- ly and ten -- der -- ly Je -- sus is call -- ing— Call -- ing for you and for me; Pa -- tient -- ly Je -- sus is wait -- ing and watch -- ing— Watch -- ing for you and for me! Come home! come home! Ye who are wea -- ry, come home! Earn -- est -- ly, ten -- der -- ly, Je -- sus is call -- ing, Call -- ing, O sin -- ner, come home!

lyrics.stanza: Come home! come home! Ye who are weary, come home! Earnestly, tenderly, Jesus is calling, Calling, O sinner, come home!
